goal.ch: To help graduate students to prepare the thesis writing.
goal.en: To help graduate students to prepare the thesis writing.

outline.ch: Students are expected to present some recent literature on data assimilation in conjunction with deep learning techniques.
outline.en: Students are expected to present some recent literature on data assimilation in conjunction with deep learning techniques.

textbook.ch: 1. Data Assimilation: Methods, Algorithms, and Applications, Asch, Bocquet and Modet, SIAM, 2016. 2. Deep Data Assimilation: Integrating Deep Learning with Data Assimilation Arcucci, Zhu, Hu, Guo, Applied Sciences, 2021
textbook.en:
1. Data Assimilation: Methods, Algorithms, and Applications, Asch, Bocquet and Modet, SIAM, 2016. 
2. Deep Data Assimilation: Integrating Deep Learning with Data Assimilation Arcucci, Zhu, Hu, Guo, Applied Sciences, 2021

instructMethod.ch:
研討
實習/實驗
個別指導

flexDiscription.ch: Students are encouraged to watch YouTube videos related to data assimilation.
flexDiscription.en: Students are encouraged to watch YouTube videos related to data assimilation.
